title: 45.3 (LOA)
content:
Nal catches up to you. "We're making good time," she says as she wipes sweat from her brow. "If we still plan on reaching Greenbriar Knoll today, however, we'll have to move more quickly still."

A) Accompany Nal to Greenbriar Knoll. Discard all   from Spirit Speaker Nal.

B) Farewell for now. Discard Spirit Speaker Nal. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
